title: Toriko no Toriko
sinopse:
Financial conglomerate Asahi, which is worth 8 trillion yen, has Hinaka as the only daughter of the head of the family, who is on the verge of death. Hinaka keeps fighting off all the looming assassins, but what will happen when she's confronted with the "strongest professional hitman," Kyouma...?!

(Source: MU)
